metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4235 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.Description:
shadow: TOCTOU (time-of-check time-of-use) race condition when copying andremoving directory trees

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4235` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsubid4 - 1:4.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu1
login - 1:4.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu1
passwd - 1:4.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu1
uidmap - 1:4.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: shadow package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:4.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu1').
